settings.blog-title: Chinti and Parker x BarbieTM Collaboration Launch Party

settings.text: In a delightful confluence of fashion, nostalgia, and femininity, Chinti and Parker hosted a sensational event in collaboration with BarbieTM. The evening proved to be a remarkable success, with a full capacity of influencers gathering to witness the magic of the Barbie collections. The event was graced by none other than Chinti and Parker's esteemed Founder & CEO, Rachael Wood, who shared her insights and passion for the collaboration. The venue was adorned with charming Barbie-themed decorations, and the atmosphere was nothing short of vibrant and bubbly, much like the pink drinks served throughout the evening.

settings.grid-content: The Barbie collection created an atmosphere of unparalleled enthusiasm, revealing a stunning array of chic and playful designs that blended Chinti and Parker's signature style with the essence of Barbie's timeless charm. The collections showcased a delightful mix of pastels, bold patterns, and quirky detailing, embodying the spirit of the modern Barbie woman. With the ambiance brimming with Barbie magic, guests had the opportunity to immerse themselves in a captivating Barbie-themed photoshoot wearing the collections and try on all of the Barbie range.

The Barbie-themed photoshoot wearing the new collection added a playful touch to the evening, encouraging everyone to embrace their inner Barbie with laughter and fun. The pink drinks and pink ice cream further lifted spirits and added to the jubilant atmosphere of the event.

settings.text: In retrospect, the Chinti and Parker x Barbie event was a resounding success, leaving guests with cherished memories and a renewed appreciation for the spirit of Barbie's empowerment. As the event concluded, attendees departed with hearts full of joy and gratitude, eagerly looking forward to the remarkable journey of this unique collaboration between two beloved brands.

settings.title: Women’s Charcoal Cashmere Sweaters
settings.text: Deeper than grey yet still a staple that belongs in every woman’s wardrobe, explore Chinti & Parker’s luxurious edit of charcoal cashmere sweaters. From boxy silhouettes to slouchy rollnecks, our styles can be combined with an assortment of pieces, allowing you to dress for any occasion. Each of our cashmere sweaters is carefully crafted from the finest fibres; soft to the touch, cosy enough for winter yet also cool enough for summer. It’s the perfect addition to your year-round rotation. Keep your new grey cashmere jumper looking as good as the day you bought it; follow the advice in our cashmere care guide.

settings.title: Women’s Cream Cashmere Sweaters
settings.text: Knitwear drawer looking a little dull? Why not introduce one or two of Chinti & Parker’s crisp cream cashmere sweaters into the mix? The freshest colour that will instantly revitalise any wardrobe, a cream jumper will always look bright, stylish and chic. Ours are crafted from sumptuously soft cashmere for the most luxurious finish that can be worn all year round. Whether you prefer a plain staple that can be dressed up with accessories, or pops of colour and that signature Chinti & Parker detailing for unexpected flair – your new perfect piece is right here. Ensure your sweater lasts for years, by following our cashmere care guide.

MAKE SMALL, GRADUAL CHANGES

Small, gradual changes can make working towards a more sustainable lifestyle appear less overwhelming, particularly for those at the beginning of their journey. Start out small, do your research, and forgive yourself for occasional and minor setbacks - nobody becomes the perfect ethical fashion consumer overnight.

settings.grid-content: Technology has helped us in so many ways, but it also has its drawbacks. And while going completely without screens just isn’t possible, minimising your exposure to both blue light and social media can help not only your sleep patterns, but also your mental health.

Exercising may not sound like your ideal form of self-care, but we promise it does wonders. Moving your body doesn’t necessarily mean spending hours at the gym or running a marathon - unless you’re into that. It could mean starting an at-home yoga practice, or going for a gentle walk in the afternoon sun. Find a form of movement that you enjoy, and that makes you feel good.

settings.title: Get Enough Sleep
settings.text: Sleep is highly underrated. Even the most minor inconvenience can seem overwhelming when we’re tired. So, when everything seems a bit much, consider calling it a day. But rather than flinging yourself into bed, take the time to curate a relaxing and sustainable bedtime routine, which will help you on your way to better sleep. Taking a break from screens, wearing comfortable loungewear, and cultivating a specific sleeping environment, are all proactive steps you can take.

settings.grid-content: A navy cashmere sweater is the perfect go-between if you can’t decide between a neutral that will go with everything, and a hint of colour. Deep enough to match most other shades, yet rich enough to add vibrancy, does it get more classic than navy cashmere? Explore Chinti & Parker’s offering of styles in this timeless colour, each one crafted from the finest fibres that are incredibly soft to the touch. Oversized? Slouchy? Or a classic fit? You’ll find all options here. Keep your navy knitwear as vibrant as the day you bought it; simply follow the advice in our cashmere care guide .

settings.title: Women’s Orange Cashmere Sweaters
settings.text: A mood-lifting addition to your rotation, find your perfect fit in the Chinti & Parker collection of orange cashmere sweaters. Mood-lifting and guaranteed to elevate any ensemble - from smart to casual - to new levels of chic. Choose your best style - whether it’s a boxy fit, slouchy silhouette, or a rollneck - there’s something for every style. Pair this vibrant shade with any dark neutral, such as black trousers or your favourite dark wash denim for a stylish contrast. Care for our pieces well - by following our cashmere care guide - and you can wear on repeat throughout the seasons.
